resources.string: Here it is our new college application
Jai Narain College of Technology (JNCT), Bhopal is considered to be unique in engineering education as it is firmly rooted in local soil and capable of articulating Indian ethos.
Chairman of LNCT Group of College

â€œTechnology plays a dominant role in the economic and societal development of the nation. A nation on progressive path needs technically sound human resource for achieving multifarious technical capabilities".
You will Get a great Environment
Here We Celebrate All things, we learn , we create and we Innovate Being a Part of JNCT and JNCTs is simply a Remarkable thing.
You will Get high Qualified Faculties with calm personality and great knowledge.
Our Faculties have a Good Communication skills with Students and a great Teaching Experience with a Great unforgetable Personality and Good Knowledge Skills.
Beside Studies , you will get the Extra-curricular Activities, this Really helps to develop your personality.
"Extra-curricular activities play an Important Role for Developing our Personality and knowing who we are and what is our Strength. In JNCT Activites like NSS, NatureClub, Nukkad Natak etc".
